entry.title: Blind Faith
entry.summary:
Author: AxisMage

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 157,351Chapters: 25/?Kudos: 164

Summary: It's no one's fault but his own that Dick is sitting there now, cold and utterly miserable, and very close to freezing to death.It's no one's fault but his own that he let his heart and mind get away again. It's no one's fault but his own that he wanted for someone who couldn't and wouldn't be his, and Wally is right.Dick needs to get back to his life, start over and make new friends. That's all, nothing more and nothing less. Friends, Dick needs friends, and sadly (according to Wally), Krypto isn't enough.

entry.title: a grave in the sky (where it's roomy to lie)
entry.summary:
Author: svalas

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 47,275Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 203

Summary: Nightwing stood up, and the expression on his face made Spoiler step back nervously. His hand unfurled, shaking, revealing a sharp and bloody switchblade. Its body was a beautiful red. An ouroboros had been carved around it. “Somebody was here.” If his voice went any tighter it might shatter. “And we were too late.” (Again, he added in his mind. Then he flinched and had to remind himself—not Jason. Jason’s dead. Just the Joker.) or, what might have happened in UTRH if Black Mask was just a bit smarter

entry.title: winter cicada
entry.summary:
Author: mikaminato

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,137Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 55

Summary: "Do you think if I let you… if I let you do what you came here to do… this void will finally go away?" He had surprised them both with his words, and they still haunt him to this day. "It never goes away. You just get used to it," Red Hood said. "Do you also wake up with tears on your face?" Talon asked, and the earnestness of the question caught them both off-guard. "Are you even capable of tears?" "I wish I wasn't." (Or, after the fall of the Court of the Owls, Talon is adrift. Until he meets Red Hood, and tries to kill him. Falling in love wasn't part of the plan.)

entry.title: You Are Out of My League
entry.summary:
Author: ivebeenbamboozled (brainwitchletty)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 575,675Chapters: 53/60Kudos: 1,477

Summary: The story begins with a new Robin to replace the old, with Nightwing none the wiser to being replaced at all, and suddenly he has a little brother within the same terrible day. It takes a while to accept, but Dick quickly learns this new Robin-- Jason Todd-- is exactly what Dick Grayson was always missing in his life, and in many more ways than one. Through the years with the team and working with the Justice League, Jason finds a place for himself and becomes a vital member of the Young Justice League while also becoming a vital centerpiece in Dick's life. And when all that ends-- when Jason Todd is taken away from Dick-- it's going to be even harder to put his life back together with that emptiness returning once more. . . . Mostly canon compliant story detailing Jason's introduction to the Young Justice League as Robin, his eventual death, and Dick discovering the mysterious red-hooded figure acting as Ra's Al Ghul's bodyguard is a lot more familiar than he should be.

entry.title: i once was blind but now i see
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,652Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 302

Summary: At school, they were taught that Guides were gentle. Nurturing. Made to soothe their Sentinels, to ground them, to serve. They weren’t fighters. They weren’t strong. They posed no threat. The League taught Jason the truth. Few things in the world were more dangerous—or more terrifying—than a Guide. Because a true Empath didn’t need to lift a weapon to destroy you. They only had to feel you—deep enough, long enough—and they could take you apart from the inside out. Or: Having grown up on the streets, Jason thought he already understood the depths of human suffering. But awakening as a Guide shattered that illusion—because knowing pain was one thing. Feeling it, in all its raw, unfiltered truth from everyone around him, was something else entirely.

entry.title: Transference
entry.summary:
Author: murphy_stoffelis

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 60,432Chapters: 13/18Kudos: 159

Summary: A violent blight is sweeping through Gotham. Innocent people are suddenly being consumed by rage— with disastrous consequences. With no cure in sight, Jason finds himself working with Batman to save the city from madness. Even with his resurrection a thing of the past, an alliance with the Bats is a harrowing line between reconnecting with a former life and preserving the Red Hood's hard-won autonomy— especially when Jason's partnership with Dick Grayson begins to rekindle a past they've both tried to bury. Because in a city like Gotham, you can't trust who you love. Not even family.

entry.title: Glass Rain
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 107,747Chapters: 22/42Kudos: 927

Summary: Jason Todd wakes up in the wrong Gotham.Here, he stayed dead. Here, his death broke his family so completely they became the monsters they once fought. Dick Grayson haunts the skyline with wings and talons, Barbara Gordon moves like a spider made of shadow, and something that might have once been Batman rules from a corrupted cave.The city is quarantined, the air tastes of ozone and old blood, and Jason should be running.Instead, he finds himself drawn to the creature that was once his brother—the one stalking him through twisted streets with eyes that still burn with something almost human.Some hunts, it turns out, go both ways.

entry.title: My little Robin
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 71,909Chapters: 17/50Kudos: 152

Summary: After Robin got kidnapped, ages ago, for the ploy of a love sick Talia, for proposing to Bruce in their twisted way, she'd come to Dick, desperate, alone, pretending to be broken.Dick, just fired as Robin, with a replacement lined up, doesn't believe one word she says, until she starts being honest. Until he sees a way to handle his hurt feelings.Three years later, she's back. Not broken, not quite as desperate, and yet honest, again. Honest how she's afraid of her position as heir to the League, with an actual male heir around. Honest about her wish to get rid of said heir.Dick has no choice, not really. He has to take Damian in. It's his son, after all. Fic is fully written and will be uploaded chapter by chapter. Upload every Wednesday and Sunday. Which means this will be done... December 31st, if I do daily uploads in the Christmas weeks. It'll allow you to read the last chapter, which is set shortly after midnight, on New Year's Day, after midnight ;)

entry.title: I Wanna Be Your Provider
entry.summary:
Author: kitnotkat95

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,067Chapters: 2/7Kudos: 51

Summary: Dick and Slade have been together for years, Slade being Dick's daddy so he could brat it up to his hearts content, blowing off steam from the pressure of being the whole damn Justice League's golden boy. Not long after Jason returns and he's got more than enough of his own shit to work through, Dick decides he needs a daddy too, and he tells Slade he's pretty sure he's supposed to be Jason's daddy like Slade was for him. Dick thinks that what Jason needs is to learn, like he did, that it can feel good to have someone put you in your place. Slade doesn't necessarily agree with either of these trains of thought, but sometimes with Dick the only way out is through and from what Slade could see Dick was at least close enough on both counts that Jason agrees to try.
